Set a single-ended analog output into a particular state
Parameters:
port - The port to drive (B5..7=POD[0..7] B3..4=0 B0..2=BIT[0..7])
value - The value to drive 0..1
Throws:
TestBusException - if there was a problem with the bus

Parameters:
portp - The positive port to drive (B5..7=POD[0..7] B3..4=0 B0..2=BIT[0..7])
portn - The positive port to drive (B5..7=POD[0..7] B3..4=0 B0..2=BIT[0..7])

TestBusException - if there was a problem with the bus

drive_digital_output

public void drive_digital_output(int port,
                                 int state,
                                 int mode)
                          throws TestBusException
Set a single-ended digital output to a particular state
Parameters:
port - The port to drive (B5..7=POD[0..7] B3..4=PORT[0..3] B0..2=BIT[0..7])
state - 0=LO,1=HI
mode - 0=Resistive 5.6K pulldown 1=CMOS 2=HighZ 3=Resistive 5.6K pullup
Throws:
TestBusException - if there was a problem with the bus

drive_digital_output

public void drive_digital_output(int portp,
                                 int portn,
                                 int state,
                                 int mode)
                          throws TestBusException
Set a double-ended digital output to a particular state
Parameters:
portp - The positive port to drive (B5..7=POD[0..7] B3..4=PORT[0..3] B0..2=BIT[0..7])
portn - The positive port to drive (B5..7=POD[0..7] B3..4=PORT[0..3] B0..2=BIT[0..7])
state - 0=LO,1=HI
mode - 0=Open drain 1=CMOS 2=HighZ 3=Open collector
Throws:
TestBusException - if there was a problem with the bus

read_analog_input

public int read_analog_input(int port_p,
                             int port_n,
                             int gaink)
                      throws TestBusException
Read the state of a single-ended or double-ended analog input
Parameters:
port_p - The positive port to test (B5..7=POD[0..7] B3..4=PORT[0..3] B0..2=BIT[0..7]) (0=AGND)
port_n - The negative port to test (B5..7=POD[0..7] B3..4=PORT[0..3] B0..2=BIT[0..7]) (0=AGND)
gaink - The gain setting for the signal conditioning op-amp
Returns:
int analog value between -2047 and 2047
Throws:
TestBusException - if there was a problem with the bus

read_digital_input

public int read_digital_input(int port,
                              boolean force_input)
                       throws TestBusException
Read the state of a single-ended digital input
Parameters:
port - The port to test (B5..7=POD[0..7] B3..4=PORT[0..3] B0..2=BIT[0..7])
force_input - Whether to force the pin to an input first
Returns:
int indicating whether the input was high or low
Throws:
TestBusException - if there was a problem with the bus
